Dialogue: Sit down already! If you're standing it will end us all. I couldn't convince that asshole in the corner but maybe if everyone else is sitting it will be okay.
I had a vision, I heard a voice that said every person must be sitting at the top of every minute! Get in a seat, I beg you!
That's right, at the end of every minute everyone has to be sitting down!
It's been hours, maybe if we follow the instructions this will all end, I want it to end!
If you insist on walking around at least try to convince that stupid man with the glasses to take a seat, he'll end up killing us all!
This is some sort of test, I just know it.
Sit down, it's our only hope!
